products.title: Bella Blackout Sloe Purple 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: This soft bella blackout sloe purple vertical blind brings warm-toned splash of purple to your room. This blind reduces light through its blackout properties, making this quality made to measure vertical blind a perfect addition to any room that needs optimum light control. Whether its fully closed, binge-watching the latest riveting tv drama, or letting the light in (but keeping your privacy), their vertical blinds are great for privacy for bedroom, living room or office.

products.title: Bella Blackout Orchid Purple 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their best-selling bella blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. This orchid purple vertical blind adds a bold splash of colour and is also made from blackout fabric, to help block out the light when desired, making this quality made to measure vertical blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.
